Service Details: - Cooperates with and renders assistance to the Police, especially the Royal Canadian Mounted Police, in all matters of common interest or concern- Promotes the physical, social and economic welfare of the Association's members or the members of their immediate families and provides support to worthy community services or organizations of a charitable or benevolent nature
Eligibility: Membership is open to any former regular, special constable, auxiliary constable or civilian member of the Force
How to Apply: For membership form please contact Secretary, Bob Fairhurst
